The Burr Paw is flexible and worn on the hand. While using it, the paw easily conforms to irregularly shaped surfaces, such as, shoelaces or your pets ear. With a simple sweeping motion, stickers and burrs adhere to the surface of Burr Paw. This leaves you and/or your pet burr free.
